name: Right Route by R.F Bongarten
description:
"When we look ahead
And we get to look at what's right to see
But the right path is full of mountains ahead
But no problems
the mountains are beautiful
Beautiful messages
Beautiful paths that lead me to the right route.”

By R.F. Bongarten, brazilian artist.

Passionate about Abstract Arts, he was inspired by Kandinsky, Pollok and other Geniuses of this segment. In 2009 he started an Artistic Project of Books and Arts called Poetic Factory.

@napstudio.br
